description: Given a user pool ID, lists app clients. App clients are sets of rules for the access that you want a user pool to grant to one application. For more information, see App clients.

parameters.name: UserPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the user pool where you want to list user pool clients.

nested_items.name: UserPoolClients
nested_items.description: An array of app clients and their details. Includes app client ID and name.

nested_items.name: UserPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user pool that's associated with the app client.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The identifier that Amazon Cognito returned with the previous request to this operation. When you include a pagination token in your request, Amazon Cognito returns the next set of items in the list. By use of this token, you can paginate through the full list of items.
